monsters.name: Bandit Assassin
monsters.flavor: You’ve got money, they want money… a perfect match! (hand it over)
special_actions: Parry
Treat attacks against you that roll 2 as a miss.
biome_loot: VERY valuable item (stolen; its owner may come looking for it, or reward you for its return), kidnapped person, leather armor, chipped blades, old food, fine art or clothes, wagon load of some commodity (salt, nails, wool, etc.), coded letter from a secretive client.

actions: 3d8 (Range 12). Also strikes the next closest creature. On miss: damage self instead.
special_actions: Parry
Treat attacks against you that roll 2 as a miss.
biome_loot: VERY valuable item (stolen; its owner may come looking for it, or reward you for its return), kidnapped person, leather armor, chipped blades, old food, fine art or clothes, wagon load of some commodity (salt, nails, wool, etc.), coded letter from a secretive client.

monsters.name: Cultist
monsters.flavor: Driven by twisted beliefs, fanatical cultists perform dark rituals to awaken ancient evils, unleashing horrors that feast on fear and despair.
actions: If undamaged, attack self for 2 damage. Adjacent enemies are inflicted with Despair. OR:
special_actions: Fanatical Zeal
While not at max HP, make all rolls with advantage. Your crits also inflict Despair.
Despair
Disadvantage on the next attack you make this encounter.
biome_loot: Bloodstained dagger (engraved with dark symbols), a twisted idol (whispers terrible thoughts), vial of black ichor, a mask (carved, likeness of a fiend), a tattered robe (lined with hidden pockets), a scroll with summoning rituals(half-finished), shackles inscribed with infernal runes, fragment of a fiendish contract, black candles (cannot be extinguished).

monsters.name: Doomsayer
monsters.flavor: Driven by twisted beliefs, fanatical cultists perform dark rituals to awaken ancient evils, unleashing horrors that feast on fear and despair.
actions: (Concentration) Reduce all damage done to allies who can hear you to 1. OR:
2d6 psychic damage to all enemies who can hear you.
special_actions: Fanatical Zeal
While not at max HP, make all rolls with advantage. Your crits also inflict Despair.
Despair
Disadvantage on the next attack you make this encounter.
biome_loot: Bloodstained dagger (engraved with dark symbols), a twisted idol (whispers terrible thoughts), vial of black ichor, a mask (carved, likeness of a fiend), a tattered robe (lined with hidden pockets), a scroll with summoning rituals(half-finished), shackles inscribed with infernal runes, fragment of a fiendish contract, black candles (cannot be extinguished).

monsters.name: Fanatic
monsters.flavor: Driven by twisted beliefs, fanatical cultists perform dark rituals to awaken ancient evils, unleashing horrors that feast on fear and despair.
actions: If undamaged, attack self for 2 damage. Adjacent enemies are inflicted with Despair. OR:
Contested STR check or Grappled (reroll to escape, or any radiant damage); if successful, deal 3d6+6 psychic damage (cannot be Defended or Interposed against).
special_actions: Fanatical Zeal
While not at max HP, make all rolls with advantage. Your crits also inflict Despair.
Despair
Disadvantage on the next attack you make this encounter.
biome_loot: Bloodstained dagger (engraved with dark symbols), a twisted idol (whispers terrible thoughts), vial of black ichor, a mask (carved, likeness of a fiend), a tattered robe (lined with hidden pockets), a scroll with summoning rituals(half-finished), shackles inscribed with infernal runes, fragment of a fiendish contract, black candles (cannot be extinguished).

monsters.name: Glabrezu
monsters.flavor: Driven by twisted beliefs, fanatical cultists perform dark rituals to awaken ancient evils, unleashing horrors that feast on fear and despair.
actions: (Reach 2) 3d6+10. On damage: Grappled (escape DC 17). If the same creature is Grappled by both of the glabrezu’s claws, it must escape from each of them separately. OR:
(A creature Grappled by both of the glabrezu’s claws) 50 unpreventable damage. If the target is at 0 HP: DC 17 STR save or be torn in two, dying instantly.
biome_loot: Bloodstained dagger (engraved with dark symbols), a twisted idol (whispers terrible thoughts), vial of black ichor, a mask (carved, likeness of a fiend), a tattered robe (lined with hidden pockets), a scroll with summoning rituals(half-finished), shackles inscribed with infernal runes, fragment of a fiendish contract, black candles (cannot be extinguished).

monsters.name: Spiny Fiend
monsters.flavor: Driven by twisted beliefs, fanatical cultists perform dark rituals to awaken ancient evils, unleashing horrors that feast on fear and despair.
biome_loot: Bloodstained dagger (engraved with dark symbols), a twisted idol (whispers terrible thoughts), vial of black ichor, a mask (carved, likeness of a fiend), a tattered robe (lined with hidden pockets), a scroll with summoning rituals(half-finished), shackles inscribed with infernal runes, fragment of a fiendish contract, black candles (cannot be extinguished).

monsters.name: Stenchling
monsters.flavor: Driven by twisted beliefs, fanatical cultists perform dark rituals to awaken ancient evils, unleashing horrors that feast on fear and despair.
biome_loot: Bloodstained dagger (engraved with dark symbols), a twisted idol (whispers terrible thoughts), vial of black ichor, a mask (carved, likeness of a fiend), a tattered robe (lined with hidden pockets), a scroll with summoning rituals(half-finished), shackles inscribed with infernal runes, fragment of a fiendish contract, black candles (cannot be extinguished).

monsters.name: Black Pudding
monsters.flavor: For some creatures, YOU are the loot at the end of the dungeon.
special_actions: Digestive Touch
Contact with an ooze inflicts the Digested condition: they deal an additional X damage for each time the target has been Digested this encounter.
Goopy
When crit or dealt any slashing damage: summon X ooze minions (size: d6); their attacks inflict Digested.
biome_loot: Tarnished coins (partially dissolved by acid), ancient bones with traces of gnaw marks, indigestible items (bones, gems, magical trinkets), a leather-bound journal (water-damaged pages), lockpicks, a treasure map (only half), boots (suspiciously untouched by corrosion).

monsters.name: Elder Ooze
monsters.flavor: For some creatures, YOU are the loot at the end of the dungeon.
special_actions: Digestive Touch
Contact with an ooze inflicts the Digested condition: they deal an additional X damage for each time the target has been Digested this encounter.
Goopy
When crit or dealt any slashing damage: summon X ooze minions (size: d6); their attacks inflict Digested.
biome_loot: Tarnished coins (partially dissolved by acid), ancient bones with traces of gnaw marks, indigestible items (bones, gems, magical trinkets), a leather-bound journal (water-damaged pages), lockpicks, a treasure map (only half), boots (suspiciously untouched by corrosion).

monsters.name: Greater Stirge
monsters.flavor: For some creatures, YOU are the loot at the end of the dungeon.
special_actions: Evasive Flier
Attacks against stirges are made with disadvantage.
Latched On
You move where your target moves until either dies. Your attacks can’t miss or be Defended/Interposed against. Attacks that miss you damage your target instead.
biome_loot: Tarnished coins (partially dissolved by acid), ancient bones with traces of gnaw marks, indigestible items (bones, gems, magical trinkets), a leather-bound journal (water-damaged pages), lockpicks, a treasure map (only half), boots (suspiciously untouched by corrosion).

monsters.name: Medium Mimic
monsters.flavor: For some creatures, YOU are the loot at the end of the dungeon.
special_actions: Ambusher
Mimics always start first and heroes roll Initiative with disadvantage.
Sticky
Mimic hits also Grapple and can Grapple any number of creatures. When crit: release 1 creature (attacker’s choice).
biome_loot: Tarnished coins (partially dissolved by acid), ancient bones with traces of gnaw marks, indigestible items (bones, gems, magical trinkets), a leather-bound journal (water-damaged pages), lockpicks, a treasure map (only half), boots (suspiciously untouched by corrosion).

monsters.name: Acidpod
monsters.flavor: Every shadow hides a predator, every branch and leaf conspires against you, the forest is alive—and you are not welcome.
special_actions: Peeling Bark
Damage degrades Armor 1 step: Heavy » Medium » None.
biome_loot: 25 ft. of vines (usable as rope), glowing sap (minor healing properties), moss-covered coins from an ancient era, a brittleleaf with veins that spell out words in Druidic, a pouch of dried herbs, a cluster of rare mushrooms, a handful of acorns (they grow INSTANTLY when placed in water), a small flowerthat never wilts, flute overgrown with moss, a tattered mapto a hidden grove, a dried flower crown.

actions: (2×). (Reach 6) 1d6+2. On Hit: Grappled (escape DC 12, or any fire or slashing damage).

monsters.name: Bugbear
monsters.flavor: Green, cunning, & thriving on the edge of chaos. Will mock you mercilessly if given the chance.
special_actions: Haha, Missed Me!
Whenever an attack misses you, deal 1 psychic damage in return.
biome_loot: Live mouse (a snack for later), moldy bread, smooth stones, sharp sticks, teeth (forcibly removed), arrows (surprisingly well-made), lots of blades (jagged, but effective), dead captive (forgot to feed him), shiny junk (random shiny bits of metal, broken glass, and buttons), slug farm (a jar of slimy, wriggling slugs), "Potion" (suspiciously colored liquid in a dirty bottle), unidentifiable jerky. A filthy notebook tracking bizarre trades and bets, boots (too big).

monsters.flavor: Mighty brutes and cunning beasts, always on the lookout for easy prey.

monsters.name: Bulette
monsters.flavor: Mighty brutes and cunning beasts, always on the lookout for easy prey.
actions: (A Grappled creature) 2d12 then drag below and burrow away. OR:
(If not grappling) leap 6, and attack for1d12+20. On hit: Grappled.

actions: (if grappling) Fly upward 12 and release (6d6 fall damage).

actions: (Reach 4, target up to 2 creatures) 3d12+20. On hit: Grappled (escapeDC18). OR:
Fly upward 20 spaces, deal 20 damage to Grappled creatures, then release (10d6 fall damage).

monsters.name: Kobold Clanger
monsters.flavor: Small, maniacal dragonlings. Fiercely protective of their own.
actions: Allies who hear your clanging, roll 1 additional die whenever they attack.
special_actions: Nooooo!
When an ally within 2 spaces dies, attack once for free.
biome_loot: Honey, LOTS of twine, sandwiches (stolen), shiny objects, dragon painting (poorly—yet lovingly—made), rotting meats, a variety of traps (small cages, spikes, snapping).

monsters.name: Ghoul
monsters.flavor: Hate the living for not being dead, hate themselves for not being living.
special_actions: Unliving, Undying
The first time this dies, reset to 1 HP instead (excluding minions).
biome_loot: Tarnished silver locket containing a faded portrait (who is it?), bone fragments engraved with arcane symbols, a dark gemstone (emits a faint chill), vials of blood (long-dried), a diary written in an ancient hand, a macabre necklace (skeletal finger bones), a broken holy symbol smeared with ash, a signet ring from a lost noble house, moldy grave dirt (whispers when touched), shovel.

monsters.name: Giant Zombie
monsters.flavor: Hate the living for not being dead, hate themselves for not being living.

special_actions: Unliving, Undying
The first time this dies, reset to 1 HP instead (excluding minions).
biome_loot: Tarnished silver locket containing a faded portrait (who is it?), bone fragments engraved with arcane symbols, a dark gemstone (emits a faint chill), vials of blood (long-dried), a diary written in an ancient hand, a macabre necklace (skeletal finger bones), a broken holy symbol smeared with ash, a signet ring from a lost noble house, moldy grave dirt (whispers when touched), shovel.

monsters.name: Cloaker
monsters.flavor: Nightmarish denizens of the deep, these monstrous beings lurk in dark tunnels and cavernous depths, ready to ensnare or devour any intruders.
actions: DC 16 WIL save, or creatures within 6 spaces are Frightened and must spend 1 Action moving as far away as possible.
biome_loot: Chitinous plating, tunnel map (hastily scrawled), serrated teeth (as much as you can carry), spider silk, venom sac, partially digested meats, gemstones (uncut), pheromone gland, luminescent fungus, molted cara¬pace, rusted tools, ancient coins, echo stones (faintly hum when tapped).

monsters.name: Ettercap
monsters.flavor: Nightmarish denizens of the deep, these monstrous beings lurk in dark tunnels and cavernous depths, ready to ensnare or devour any intruders.
actions: 1d8+2. On hit: Grappled (escape DC 13), Silenced until target escapes.
special_actions: Silenced. Cannot cast spells or use other abilities that require speaking (e.g. Commander’s Orders).

actions: Creatures in a 2×6 area take 50 damage on a failed DC 18 DEX save. (Creatures who fail can spend 1 Action to dive out of the way instead of taking this damage. They move half their speed and land Prone.) OR:

monsters.name: Abyssal Floater
monsters.flavor: The water is cold enough to steal your strength, and whatever lives here does not need to hurry.
special_actions: Pressure Sickness
Attacks from deepwater aberrations Slow their targets.
biome_loot: Salt-encrusted coins, barnacle-covered weapons, coral-inlaid jewelry, fossilized pearls, ancient diving bells, waterproof scroll tubes, half-digested boots, frozen journals sealed in ice.

monsters.name: Ancient Lobstrosity

monsters.name: Rime Tongue
monsters.flavor: The water is cold enough to steal your strength, and whatever lives here does not need to hurry.
special_actions: Drag Beneath

Rime tongue hits Slow their targets. If a Slowed creature is hit again, it becomes Grappled/Restrained. You move where your target moves until one of you dies. Attacks that miss the rime tongue instead strike the grappled target.
biome_loot: Salt-encrusted coins, barnacle-covered weapons, coral-inlaid jewelry, fossilized pearls, ancient diving bells, waterproof scroll tubes, half-digested boots, frozen journals sealed in ice.

monsters.name: Captain Smokebeard
monsters.file: C:\TTRPG_Vault\Nimble Vault\Homebrew (Optional)\Foes\Monsters\Crew of the Ashen Kraken\Captain Smokebeard.md
monsters.flavor: (by Malikua) Soot-covered pirates,their ship listing from the weight of a terrifying cannon.
actions: (Cone 3) DC 12 DEX save or Blinded for 1 turn.
special_actions: Cutthroat's Edge
Attacks against full-health enemies automatically crit.
The Kraken Cannon
Operated by 2 Kraken Cannoneers. Deals d44 damage in a 3x3 area around a Marked target within Reach 30. Must be reloaded after firing (2 actions). Not affected by Cutthroat's Edge.

When you roll a critical hit or die, spawn a Droplet on an adjacent space.

Use Naturecraft when rolling initiative against the Meriähti.
Autotomous
Spawn 2 Severed Arms after dying.

legendary_monsters.name: Alaric Draegoth, the Crimson Count
legendary_monsters.file: C:\TTRPG_Vault\Nimble Vault\Foes\Legendary Monsters\Alaric Draegoth, the Crimson Count.md
actions: Deal 1d10+15 damage, your target is considered Bloodied for 1 round. Fly 8 before or after attacking.
If no creature is Beguiled, Beguile a target on a failed DC 18 WIL save (w/ disadvantage if Bloodied).
Move a Beguiled creature adjacent to you and bite them: 2d10+30 damage and 1 Wound.
special_actions: Sanguine Cloak. (1/turn) Deal 1d10 necrotic damage whenever you are hit, the attack is reduced by this amount.
Sunscorn: Vulnerable to radiant. After taking radiant damage, use Beguile as a Reaction, they roll with disadvantage.
Beguiled. Dazed. Cannot Defend or allow anyone to Interpose for you. Damage ends.
legendary_monsters.bloodied: At 160 HP, gain Mistform. Not vulnerable to radiant. Bat Decoy. Whenever Alaric would take damage, instead first swap places with a bat minion, 1/round.
legendary_monsters.last_stand: Alaric is dying! 160 more damage and he dies. Until then, his Sanguine Cloak, attacks, and bats roll d20s instead of d10s.

legendary_monsters.name: Azriel, Lord of Pain & Flame
legendary_monsters.file: C:\TTRPG_Vault\Nimble Vault\Foes\Legendary Monsters\Azriel, Lord of Pain & Flame.md
actions: Move 6. (Reach 6) 3d12 damage. On hit: Grappled and pulled adjacent to Azriel (escape DC 17 STR, DEX, or until he uses the whip again).
3d12+10 fire damage to all creatures within Reach 2.
special_actions: PAIN! Crits against Azriel are Vicious, he deals damage equal to the crit dice back to the attacker.
legendary_monsters.bloodied: At 160 HP, Azriel can use Crackling Whip twice each turn.
legendary_monsters.last_stand: YES, MORE PAIN! Azriel is dying! 180 more damage and he dies. Until then, EVERY hit against him is a crit.

legendary_monsters.name: Dravok, All-Seeing Tyrant
special_actions: My plans, flawless! Dravok makes all saves with +1 Advantage, attacks against him have Disadvantage.
Weakness: Taking more than 12 piercing or slashing damage: Dravok’s plans are FLAWED! (until the end of the next hero’s turn.)
legendary_monsters.bloodied: To Dust! At 110 HP, use Petrification Ray against every enemy. His save DC increases to 18.
legendary_monsters.last_stand: Dravok is dying! 70 more damage and he dies. Until then, each turn he will move or use Warping Ray and then Devastation Beam. 2d12+20 in a 10 space long, 2 space wide line.

legendary_monsters.name: Florindris, Bane of the Forest
legendary_monsters.file: C:\TTRPG_Vault\Nimble Vault\Foes\Legendary Monsters\Florindris, Bane of the Forest.md
actions: (1 use) 3d10+10 damage to all enemies within Reach 8, half on a DC 13 DEX save.
Fly 10 before or after attacking. (Reach 2) 1d10+10 damage to up to 2 targets within reach. On hit: Gain Thornblight.
special_actions: Aura of Wind. Ranged attacks against you have disadvantage. End of turn: push adjacent creatures 2 spaces away.
Wither: Resistant to necrotic damage, but it suppresses Aura of Wind for 1 turn.
Thornblight: Suffer 5 damage for each space you are forcibly moved. Magical healing ends this effect.
legendary_monsters.bloodied: At 100 HP, enemies within Reach 12 gain Thornblight, and Petal Storm recharges.
legendary_monsters.last_stand: Florindris is dying! 70 more damage and she dies. Until then, Aura of Wind and Gust move creatures twice as far.

legendary_monsters.name: General Flameheart
actions: Move 8 then strike a 2×2 square area for 2d10+10 fire damage.

Lob a molten fireball at the furthest hero not already in the flames, igniting a 2×2 square area. Creatures there take 2d10+10 damage; and another 10 damage at the end of each of their turns if they remain in the area.
special_actions: Cinder Armor. Immune to fire. When damaged, deal 5 fire damage to all adjacent creatures.
Extinguish Flame. Cold or radiant crits extinguish all areas ignited by Molten Fury and suppress Cinder Armor for 1 turn.
legendary_monsters.bloodied: At 87 HP, on his next turn, he uses Molten Fury a number of times equal to half the number of heroes (rounded up).
legendary_monsters.last_stand: Flameheart is dying! 80 more damage and he dies. Until then, the area of his attacks increase to a 3×3 square.

legendary_monsters.name: Gloomwing the Cruel
actions: (1 use) Fly 10, then (Cone 8) DC 17 DEX save or 8d10 necrotic, half on save.
(Reach 2) Move 6, then 3d10. On damage: Cruelty’s Gift.
(Reach 4) 1d10, and knocked back that many spaces.
special_actions: Aura of Rot. Creatures within 6 spaces take 5 necrotic damage at the end of their turns.
Light Sensitivity: Radiant damage suppresses Aura of Rot until the end of the next hero’s turn.
Cruelty’s Gift: Healing is halved and Vulnerable to necrotic damage. Healing ends.
legendary_monsters.bloodied: At 160 HP Gloomwing’s Rot Breath recharges.
legendary_monsters.last_stand: Gloomwing is dying! 150 more damage and he dies. Until then, the damage and range of His Aura of Rot is doubled.

legendary_monsters.name: Grimbeak, the Unyielding
actions: (1 use) All enemies within reach 12 suffer 2d6 damage (ignoring armor). DC 11 WIL save or become Frightened for 1 round.
special_actions: Brutal. Treat the highest die rolled as the Primary Die. On crit: knock Prone.
legendary_monsters.last_stand: Grimbeak is dying! 30 more damage and she dies. Until then, her Attacks use d10s instead of d6s.

legendary_monsters.name: Kelebek & Poppy
special_actions: Stink Cloud. When damaged, enemies within 2 spaces make a STR save (DC equal to the higher of 10 or the damage done). On a failure, they must spend their next action vomiting, and they cannot take reactions this round.
legendary_monsters.bloodied: When Kelebek is reduced to 30 HP, Poppy always Interposes for him.
legendary_monsters.last_stand: When Poppy dies, the room is filled with noxious gas: all heroes have a maximum of 2 actions each turn.

legendary_monsters.name: Nalzar, Apex Predator
actions: Fly 8, then land. Cone 8: 1d12, then DC 14 STR save or also knocked Prone (advantage if behind cover or another hero).
special_actions: Tail Swipe. When dealt slashing or lightning damage: knock a hero within 3 spaces Prone.
Torn Wings. Each slashing crit reduces the Wing Buffet DC by 1.
legendary_monsters.bloodied: At 90 HP, her Wing Buffet Range and DC increase by 2.
legendary_monsters.last_stand: Nalzar is dying! 60 more damage and she dies. Until then, each turn, she moves 6, then uses Devour (ignoring the Prone requirement).

legendary_monsters.name: Pudge the Blunderer
actions: Move 8, attack for 1d8+2. On damage: Prone.
1d8+2, on damage: they are thrown at another hero within 6 spaces. Both make a DC 12 DEX save or take 1d8+2 damage and are knocked Prone, half damage on save.
legendary_monsters.bloodied: At 37 HP, Pudge's damage increases to 1d12+2.
legendary_monsters.last_stand: Pudge is dying! 20 more damage and he dies. Until then, Pudge can move 6 spaces, and use Grab & Throw each turn.

legendary_monsters.name: Queen Aranya, Broodmother
actions: (Reach 2) 2d8+8 damage. Then skitter away up to 8 spaces.
Summon spiderling minions (1/hero, size: d8); they act only when commanded.
Command all of your spiderling minions to move up to 6 spaces and attack once each.
special_actions: Weave Web. Creatures she hits are entangled in a sticky web (Dazed).
Flammable Webs. Fire critical hits suppress the Broodmother's Weave Web for 1 turn.
legendary_monsters.bloodied: "Avenge Your Queen, My Brood! At 80 HP, summon 3 spiderling minions/hero anywhere within Reach 8.
legendary_monsters.last_stand: Aranya is dying! 40 more damage and she dies. Until then, Hatch Brood after each of her turns.

legendary_monsters.name: Ravager of the Lowlands
legendary_monsters.file: C:\TTRPG_Vault\Nimble Vault\Foes\Legendary Monsters\Ravager of the Lowlands.md
special_actions: Feral Instinct. Whenever Ravager is crit, he can fly 10.
legendary_monsters.bloodied: At 65 HP, his Venomous Stinger recharges.
legendary_monsters.last_stand: The Ravager is dying! 40 more damage and he dies. Until then, the first time each turn he takes damage, he uses Move & Claw.

legendary_monsters.name: She Who Is Our Desire & End - Caerys, the Hollow Star
legendary_monsters.file: C:\TTRPG_Vault\Nimble Vault\Foes\Legendary Monsters\She Who Is Our Desire & End - Caerys, the Hollow Star.md
actions: Teleport 12. 3d20 to a creature adjacent to where you began or ended.
(Reach 12) DC 20 STR save (disadvantage if within Reach 4) or suffer 3d20 damage and Prone. Half on save.
DC 20 WIL save or DOOMED: Concentration ends, the next damage roll against you is maximized.
Reach 6, DC 20 DEX save or 2d20 lightning and 2d20 fire damage. Half on save.
(Range 12) DC 20 STR save or be launched 20 ft. into the air, repeat until the target saves. Fall damage for this attack is 1d20 for every 10 ft. fallen.
special_actions: Ravages of Time. At the beginning of each round, all heroes suffer 1 Wound.
Slipstream: 3/encounter when she would suffer any negative effect she can swap places with a creature of her choice making them the target instead. All heroes recover 1 Wound.
legendary_monsters.bloodied: At 310 HP, Gravitational Mastery. Move ALL objects and creatures within 16 spaces anywhere else within the area. Gravitational Lensing. The hero with the most HP is marked by Caerys. She takes half damage from all sources, her mark takes the other half. This lasts until the mark drops to 0 HP.
legendary_monsters.last_stand: Use Gravitational Mastery, then Caerys is dying! 200 more damage and she dies. Until then she chooses twice each turn. If still alive after 1 round: Reset Time: she resets back to full HP.

legendary_monsters.name: Thorn Quickblade
special_actions: Strike Back. When crit, make a Heart Piercer or Stormquill attack in return.
legendary_monsters.bloodied: Smoke Bomb. At 62 HP, Thorn immediately becomes invisible (until the end of his next turn), then moves 8, ignoring opportunity attacks.
legendary_monsters.last_stand: Mortal Panic! Thorn is dying! 30 more damage and he's dead! Until then he'll Strike Back EVERY time he's hit (1/turn).

legendary_monsters.name: Titan of the Deep Woods
legendary_monsters.file: C:\TTRPG_Vault\Nimble Vault\Foes\Legendary Monsters\Titan of the Deep Woods.md
actions: Move up to 10 spaces. Deal 1d4+20 damage to up to 2 targets along the path. On hit: Prone.
The 2 furthest heroes make a DC 16 STR save or are moved adjacent to Titan.
special_actions: Splintering Legions. Bludgeoning damage or any crit cause bones to splinter off and animate, forming a d10 minion.
Brittle Bones. Resistant to piercing, vulnerable to bludgeoning.
legendary_monsters.last_stand: Shattered Legion. At 0 HP Titan collapses into 4 skeleton minions/hero (d10 sized). If any remain, they reassemble into the Titan the next evening.

legendary_monsters.name: Ul'vek, Psionic Despot
actions: (If no creatures are Dominated) Choose half of the heroes to suffer 2d12 psychic damage (ignoring armor). DC 15 WIL save or Dominated as well.
(Dominated creature) Contested DEX or STR check, on success: Grappled and 6d12. Cannot be Defended or Interposed against.
Teleport 8. (Reach 8) DC 15 WIL save, force an enemy to spend one Action to make a weapon attack or cast a cantrip. On save, they attack with disadvantage.
special_actions: Mind Shield. Whenever Ul’ would fail a save or take more than 30 damage while he has a creature Dominated, he may avoid the attack instead, but all Dominated creatures come to their senses.
Dominated: Rolls are made with disadvantage while Dominated. Ul’ spend your first action on each of your turns, moving, making a weapon attack, or casting a cantrip. Damage ends.
legendary_monsters.bloodied: At 150 HP gain Illusory Shift. Reaction, when attacked (1 use): Swap places with a Dominated creature, making them the new target of the attack.
legendary_monsters.last_stand: Ul’ is dying! 110 more damage and he dies. Until then, Dominated no longer ends on taking damage. Every hero makes a WIL save or become Dominated.

legendary_monsters.name: Vael, Undying Necromancer
actions: (Range 12, undamaged target) DC 14 WIL save or 5d12 damage. Half on save.
(Range 8) 2d12+6. Double damage against those behind cover. 1/round you may swap places with them.
1d4+2. On hit: DC 14 WIL save or Dazed and Frightened. Then move 6.
special_actions: Protect Master! Whenever Vael would fail a save or take 20 or more damage, he may sacrifice his Lifebinding Spirit, Bane, instead. He spends his next turn moving up to 6 spaces and summoning Bane.
legendary_monsters.bloodied: At 125 HP, Vael gains the reaction Shield of Cruelty. (1 time use) If Vael would be damaged, instead he may reflect that much radiant damage back at the attacker.
legendary_monsters.last_stand: DEATH, AN OLD FRIEND. Vael is dying! 90 more damage and he dies. Until then, he gains Heavy Armor, the hero that most recently damaged him is reduced to 0 HP, and Bane is sacrificed into a Vengeful Spirit. It deals 1d12+6 necrotic damage to creatures within reach 3 at the end of each of his turns.

legendary_monsters.name: Carcinicus, Emperor of the Lagoon
legendary_monsters.file: C:\TTRPG_Vault\Nimble Vault\Homebrew (Optional)\Foes\Legendary Monsters\Carcinicus, Emperor of the Lagoon.md
actions: (a creature with 2+ Crabby) Move 2, 1d4 damage. On hit: Lose all stacks of Crabby and suffer 1 Wound.
special_actions: Carcinisation. When Carcinicus damages a creature, it gains a stack of Crabby.
Crabby. -1 Speed per stack. Action: Remove a stack of Crabby.
legendary_monsters.bloodied: At 60 HP, Carcinicus summons 1 Lagoonionnaire per Hero. To me my legions!
legendary_monsters.last_stand: Carcinicus is falling! 50 more damage and he dies. Until then, he chooses twice each turn.

legendary_monsters.name: Nymeron, The First Current
legendary_monsters.file: C:\TTRPG_Vault\Nimble Vault\Homebrew (Optional)\Foes\Legendary Monsters\Nymeron, The First Current.md
actions: (Cone 6) 1d12 damage. DC 13 STR save or knocked Prone (advantage if behind cover or another hero).
The next attack targeting you deals minimum damage.
special_actions: Fear The Tide. When hit, you may take double damage and move 10 for free.
legendary_monsters.bloodied: At 110 HP, Coil recharges. Fear The Tide also knocks the attacker prone.
legendary_monsters.last_stand: At 0 HP, Nymeron evaporates into a Whirling Lagoon Elemental, and spawns a Droplet next to each Hero.

legendary_monsters.name: Tidebreaker, Hunter of the Reefs
legendary_monsters.file: C:\TTRPG_Vault\Nimble Vault\Homebrew (Optional)\Foes\Legendary Monsters\Tidebreaker, Hunter of the Reefs.md
actions: (reach 2) 2d10+X damage. On hit: Push X spaces.
Xd10 damage. On damage: Prone, Slowed and Dazed for 1 turn.
special_actions: Coral Armor. Tidebreaker has Heavy Armor while the Coral Armor is intact. Gain a stack of Surge when damaged for 5 or more. Replace X with the amount of Surge stacks.
legendary_monsters.bloodied: At 90 HP, Coral Armor breaks, suppressing the effect. Retain Surge stacks.
legendary_monsters.last_stand: Tidebreaker is dying! 70 more damage, and it's washed away. Until then it gains the following action: Flash Flood. Gain a stack of Surge.

Bandits: VERY valuable item (stolen; its owner may come looking for it, or reward you for its return), kidnapped person, leather armor, chipped blades, old food, fine art or clothes, wagon load of some commodity (salt, nails, wool, etc.), coded letter from a secretive client.
Cultists & Horrors: Bloodstained dagger (engraved with dark symbols), a twisted idol (whispers terrible thoughts), vial of black ichor, a mask (carved, likeness of a fiend), a tattered robe (lined with hidden pockets), a scroll with summoning rituals(half-finished), shackles inscribed with infernal runes, fragment of a fiendish contract, black candles (cannot be extinguished).
Dungeon Denizens: Tarnished coins (partially dissolved by acid), ancient bones with traces of gnaw marks, indigestible items (bones, gems, magical trinkets), a leather-bound journal (water-damaged pages), lockpicks, a treasure map (only half), boots (suspiciously untouched by corrosion).
Forest Denizens: 25 ft. of vines (usable as rope), glowing sap (minor healing properties), moss-covered coins from an ancient era, a brittleleaf with veins that spell out words in Druidic, a pouch of dried herbs, a cluster of rare mushrooms, a handful of acorns (they grow INSTANTLY when placed in water), a small flowerthat never wilts, flute overgrown with moss, a tattered mapto a hidden grove, a dried flower crown.
Goblins: Live mouse (a snack for later), moldy bread, smooth stones, sharp sticks, teeth (forcibly removed), arrows (surprisingly well-made), lots of blades (jagged, but effective), dead captive (forgot to feed him), shiny junk (random shiny bits of metal, broken glass, and buttons), slug farm (a jar of slimy, wriggling slugs), "Potion" (suspiciously colored liquid in a dirty bottle), unidentifiable jerky. A filthy notebook tracking bizarre trades and bets, boots (too big).
Kobolds: Honey, LOTS of twine, sandwiches (stolen), shiny objects, dragon painting (poorly—yet lovingly—made), rotting meats, a variety of traps (small cages, spikes, snapping).
Undead: Tarnished silver locket containing a faded portrait (who is it?), bone fragments engraved with arcane symbols, a dark gemstone (emits a faint chill), vials of blood (long-dried), a diary written in an ancient hand, a macabre necklace (skeletal finger bones), a broken holy symbol smeared with ash, a signet ring from a lost noble house, moldy grave dirt (whispers when touched), shovel.
Underground: Chitinous plating, tunnel map (hastily scrawled), serrated teeth (as much as you can carry), spider silk, venom sac, partially digested meats, gemstones (uncut), pheromone gland, luminescent fungus, molted cara¬pace, rusted tools, ancient coins, echo stones (faintly hum when tapped).
Coldwater Predators: Salt-encrusted coins, barnacle-covered weapons, coral-inlaid jewelry, fossilized pearls, ancient diving bells, waterproof scroll tubes, half-digested boots, frozen journals sealed in ice.
